response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. After careful consideration and evaluation, I propose a special introductory price of $12,000 for you. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product that is valued at $15,000 by many, and it offers significant value to you at this discounted rate. I look forward to hearing your response soon.", "product_price": 12000}
